net.sf.libai.ants
Class Graph

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.libai.ants.Graph

public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object

This class belong to the core classes of the Ant Framework. It represent the problem being solved. It is composed of a Matrix containing the relation between nodes in the graph.

Author:
Enrique Areyan, enrique3 at gmail.com
